QueryResult.text: SELECT /*+ index(PRJ_OBS_UNITS PRJ_OBS_UNITS_U1)*/ ID, ID, TYPE_ID, PARENT_ID, DEPTH, UNIQUE_NAME, NAME, 'OBS_UNIT_ONLY' FROM PRJ_OBS_UNITS UNION SELECT /*+ index(u PRJ_OBS_UNITS_U1) index(uf PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT_N1) */ UF.BRANCH_UNIT_ID, U.ID, U.TYPE_ID, U.PARENT_ID, U.DEPTH, U.UNIQUE_NAME, U.NAME, 'OBS_UNIT_AND_CHILDREN' FROM PRJ_OBS_UNITS U,PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT UF WHERE UF.UNIT_ID = U.ID UNION SELECT /*+ index(u PRJ_OBS_UNITS_U1) index(uf PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT_N2) */ UF.UNIT_ID, U.ID, U.TYPE_ID, U.PARENT_ID, U.DEPTH, U.UNIQUE_NAME, U.NAME, 'OBS_UNIT_AND_ANCESTORS' FROM PRJ_OBS_UNITS U,PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT UF WHERE UF.BRANCH_UNIT_ID = U.ID UNION SELECT /*+ index(u PRJ_OBS_UNITS_U1) index(uf PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT_N1) */ UF.BRANCH_UNIT_ID, U.ID, U.TYPE_ID, U.PARENT_ID, U.DEPTH, U.UNIQUE_NAME, U.NAME, 'OBS_UNIT_CHILD_AND_ANCESTORS' FROM PRJ_OBS_UNITS U,PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT UF WHERE UF.UNIT_ID = U.ID UNION SELECT /*+ index(u PRJ_OBS_UNITS_U1) index(uf PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT_N2) */ UF.UNIT_ID, U.ID, U.TYPE_ID, U.PARENT_ID, U.DEPTH, U.UNIQUE_NAME, U.NAME, 'OBS_UNIT_CHILD_AND_ANCESTORS' FROM PRJ_OBS_UNITS U,PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT UF WHERE UF.BRANCH_UNIT_ID = U.ID
